# Why Use DuckDB

There are several Database Management Systems (DBMS) MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite to name a few. DuckDB is one that that has uses outside of what other DBMS can do or be used for. Referencing their page [duckdb.org](https:duckdb.org)
